import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { profileForm = new FormGroup({ login: new FormControl(''), password: new FormControl('') }); onSubmit() { console.warn(this.profileForm.value); } }
